header.title: megaco_codec_transform

description.p: This module implements a simple megaco message transformation utility.
Note that this module is not included in the runtime part of the application.

desc.p: Export the messages in the MessagePackage (default is time_test).
The output produced by this function is a directory structure with the following structure:
